## Libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(vegan)
```


## Import Data

```{r df}
df <- read.csv("MobbingData_F24.csv", h=T)
```

```{r}

wdf <- df %>% spread(key = Species, Count)

wdf[is.na(wdf)] <-0
wdf$obs <- 1:nrow(wdf)
wdf <- wdf %>% select(obs, everything())

cov <- wdf %>% select(Day,Trial,Treatment)

wdf <- wdf[,c(1,5:31)]

cov$H <- diversity(wdf)
cov$spp <- specnumber(wdf)
H.aov <- aov(H ~ Treatment, data = cov)
summary(H.aov)

spp.aov <- aov(spp ~ Treatment, data = cov)
summary(spp.aov)
```
